005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.JsonUtil;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.XmlUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.ModuleLoader;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.UriUtils;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.DefaultBindingContext;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.ISchemaGenerator;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.ISchemaGenerator.SchemaFormat;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.SchemaGenerationFeature;
027
028import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
029import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
030import org.json.JSONObject;
031
032import java.io.BufferedReader;
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.net.URI;
035import java.net.URISyntaxException;
036import java.net.URL;
037import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
038import java.nio.file.Files;
039import java.nio.file.Path;
040import java.nio.file.Paths;
041import java.util.ArrayList;
042import java.util.Collection;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Set;
045
046import javax.xml.transform.Source;
047
048import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
049
050public class ValidateContentUsingModuleCommand
051    extends AbstractValidateContentCommand {
052  @NonNull
053  private static final String COMMAND = "validate-content";
054
055  @Override
056  public String getName() {
057    return COMMAND;
058  }
059
060  @Override
061  public String getDescription() {
062    return "Verify that the provided resource is well-formed and valid to the provided Module-based model.";
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
067    Collection<? extends Option> orig = super.gatherOptions();
068
069    List<Option> retval = new ArrayList<>(orig.size() + 1);
070    retval.addAll(orig);
071    retval.add(MetaschemaCommandSupport.METASCHEMA_OPTION);
072
073    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableCollection(retval);
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine commandLine) {
078    return new OscalCommandExecutor(callingContext, commandLine);
079  }
080
081  private final class OscalCommandExecutor
082      extends AbstractValidationCommandExecutor {
083
084    private Path tempDir;
085    private IModule module;
086
087    private OscalCommandExecutor(
088        @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
089        @NonNull CommandLine commandLine) {
090      super(callingContext, commandLine);
091    }
092
093    private Path getTempDir() throws IOException {
094      if (tempDir == null) {
095        tempDir = Files.createTempDirectory("validation-");
096        tempDir.toFile().deleteOnExit();
097      }
098      return tempDir;
099    }
100
101    @NonNull
102    private IModule getModule(@NonNull Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets)
103        throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
104      URI cwd = Paths.get("").toAbsolutePath().toUri();
105
106      if (module == null) {
107        String moduleName
108            = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getCommandLine().getOptionValue(MetaschemaCommandSupport.METASCHEMA_OPTION));
109        URI moduleUri;
110
111        try {
112          moduleUri = UriUtils.toUri(moduleName, cwd);
113        } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
114          IOException newEx = new IOException( // NOPMD - intentional
115              String.format("Cannot load module as '%s' is not a valid file or URL.", moduleName));
116          newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
117          throw newEx;
118        }
119
120        assert moduleUri != null;
121
122        ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor postProcessor
123            = new ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor(constraintSets);
124
125        ModuleLoader loader = new ModuleLoader(CollectionUtil.singletonList(postProcessor));
126
127        // BindingModuleLoader loader
128        // = new BindingModuleLoader(new DefaultBindingContext(),
129        // CollectionUtil.singletonList(postProcessor));
130
131        loader.allowEntityResolution();
132        module = loader.load(moduleUri);
133      }
134      assert module != null;
135      return module;
136    }
137
138    @NonNull
139    private IModule getModule() {
140      // should be initialized already
141      return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(module);
142    }
143
144    @Override
145    protected IBindingContext getBindingContext(@NonNull Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets)
146        throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
147
148      IBindingContext retval = new DefaultBindingContext();
149      retval.registerModule(getModule(constraintSets), getTempDir());
150      return retval;
151    }
152
153    @Override
154    public List<Source> getXmlSchemas(@NonNull URL targetResource) throws IOException {
155      Path schemaFile = Files.createTempFile(getTempDir(), "schema-", ".xml");
156      assert schemaFile != null;
157      IMutableConfiguration<SchemaGenerationFeature<?>> configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
158      ISchemaGenerator.generateSchema(getModule(), schemaFile, SchemaFormat.XML, configuration);
159      return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(List.of(
160          XmlUtil.getStreamSource(schemaFile.toUri().toURL())));
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public JSONObject getJsonSchema(@NonNull JSONObject json) throws IOException {
165      Path schemaFile = Files.createTempFile(getTempDir(), "schema-", ".json");
166      assert schemaFile != null;
167      IMutableConfiguration<SchemaGenerationFeature<?>> configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
168      ISchemaGenerator.generateSchema(getModule(), schemaFile, SchemaFormat.JSON, configuration);
169      try (BufferedReader reader = ObjectUtils.notNull(Files.newBufferedReader(schemaFile, StandardCharsets.UTF_8))) {
170        return JsonUtil.toJsonObject(reader);
171      }
172    }
173  }
174
175}
